languages.text: "На твоем месте я бы не вздумал доверять этим твоим незваным "союзникам" — подобный альтруизм редко когда не таит в себе нечто злокозненное. Узнай больше об этих существах — прикажи своим слугам изловить одного из них и предать пыткам и познавательной расправе... раз уж удовольствия от этого они получить не в состоянии".

"If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism almost always ferries something foul. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and gain knowledge through the process... since they cannot find pleasure in it."
languages.original_text: "На твоем месте я бы не вздумал доверять этим твоим незваным "союзникам" — подобный альтруизм редко когда не таит в себе нечто злокозненное. Узнай больше об этих существах — прикажи своим слугам изловить одного из них и предать пыткам и познавательной расправе... раз уж удовольствия от этого они получить не в состоянии".

traits.locale_text: "If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism seldom does not have any sinister undertones to it. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment to them... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

"If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism seldom does not have any sinister undertones to it. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment to them... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

"If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism almost always ferries something foul. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

"If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism almost always ferries something foul. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

"If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism almost always ferries something foul. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and gain knowledge through the process... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

languages.text: “如果我是你，我才不会相信那些不请自来的‘盟友’。像这样的利他主义，几乎肯定会带来令人恶心的结果。我们得了解更多关于这些生物的知识。命令你的仆人追捕其中一只数据天使，折磨他们，对它们施加认知惩罚……唉，可惜他们无法从折磨中获得乐趣。”
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism almost always ferries something foul. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: “如果我是你，我才不会相信那些不请自来的‘盟友’。像这样的利他主义，几乎肯定会带来令人恶心的结果。我们得了解更多关于这些生物的知识。命令你的仆人追捕其中一只数据天使，折磨他们，对它们施加认知惩罚……唉，可惜他们无法从折磨中获得乐趣。”

languages.text: «Si yo fuera usted, no me fiaría de esos "aliados" suyos que no han sido invitados. Ese tipo de altruismo casi siempre conlleva algo sucio. Aprenda más sobre estas criaturas, ordene a sus sirvientes que atrapen a uno de ellos, lo torturen y le apliquen un castigo cognitivo... ya que no pueden encontrar placer en ello».
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism almost always ferries something foul. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: «Si yo fuera usted, no me fiaría de esos "aliados" suyos que no han sido invitados. Ese tipo de altruismo casi siempre conlleva algo sucio. Aprenda más sobre estas criaturas, ordene a sus sirvientes que atrapen a uno de ellos, lo torturen y le apliquen un castigo cognitivo... ya que no pueden encontrar placer en ello».

languages.text: 「私だったら、招かれざる '味方 'を信用することはありません...その類の利他主義は、たいていの場合、不浄なものを運んできます。もっとこの生物について情報を入手しましょう...従者に奴らの1体を捕え、拷問し、認知罰を与えるよう命じて...奴らも喜ぶことはないでしょうから」
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism almost always ferries something foul. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: 「私だったら、招かれざる '味方 'を信用することはありません...その類の利他主義は、たいていの場合、不浄なものを運んできます。もっとこの生物について情報を入手しましょう...従者に奴らの1体を捕え、拷問し、認知罰を与えるよう命じて...奴らも喜ぶことはないでしょうから」

languages.text: « Je ne ferais pas confiance à ses "alliés" non sollicités, à votre place ; un tel altruisme cache souvent des intentions peu louables. Tentez d'en apprendre davantage sur ces créatures. Ordonnez à vos serviteurs d'en traquer une, de la torturer et de lui infliger un châtiment cognitif... puisqu'elles n'y trouvent apparemment aucun plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism almost always ferries something foul. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne ferais pas confiance à ses "alliés" non sollicités, à votre place ; un tel altruisme cache souvent des intentions peu louables. Tentez d'en apprendre davantage sur ces créatures. Ordonnez à vos serviteurs d'en traquer une, de la torturer et de lui infliger un châtiment cognitif... puisqu'elles n'y trouvent apparemment aucun plaisir. »

languages.text: "Ich an Eurer Stelle würde diesen ungebetenen 'Verbündeten' nicht trauen. Ein solcher Altruismus öffnet fast immer etwas Schändlichem Tür und Tor. Bringt mehr über diese Kreaturen in Erfahrung. Befehlt Euren Dienern, einen von ihnen zu jagen, zu foltern und einer kognitiven Bestrafung zu unterziehen ... da sie kein Vergnügen darin finden."
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism almost always ferries something foul. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment... since they cannot find pleasure in it."
